info.name: Fab10 #inktober2021 "pick"

renderpass.code:
#define S(v)  smoothstep(4./R.y, 0., v ) 
#define R(a)  mat2(cos( a + vec4(0,11,33,0) ) )

void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 u)
{
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,
          U = ( u+u - R ) / R.y * R(.15), // guitare tilted frame
          V = (U +vec2(.1,.07)) * R(.3);  // pick overtilted frame
   
   O = texture(iChannel0, .5*U) * ( 1.3- .7*(.3-U.y) );          // neck
   O *=  1. + R.y/2e2 * dFdy(O.r);   // with some bump
   float  m = S(U.y-.3),                                         // m = neck mask
          x = fract(U.x)-.5; // p = 2.;
   O = mix(O, vec4(1.5-sin(1.57*x/.03))/3., S(abs(x)-.03 ) );    // frets
   
#define D(x,y) O = mix(O, vec4(.7), S(length(U-vec2(x,-y))-.1)); // marks
   D( 1, .06)
   D( 1,1.15)
   D(-1, .6 )
   
   O *= m; // clamp neck & frets to border
   
//#define pow(a,b) pow(max(a,0.),b)                              // pick 
//   x = pow( pow(V.y+.3,p) + pow(2.*V.x-V.y,p) + pow(-2.*V.x-V.y,p) , 1./p);
#define E(v) max(0.,v) * max(0.,v)
   x = sqrt( E(V.y+.3) + E(2.*V.x-V.y) + E(-2.*V.x-V.y) ); // simplif for p = 2.
   O *=  .5+.5* smoothstep(0.,.4, x-.8 );                        // shadow
#define P  O = mix(O, vec4(1,.8,0,1), S( x -.8 ) );
   P
   
   U.y -= .15;                                                   // strings
#define C(w,s) O = mix(O, vec4(1,.6,.4,0)*(1.+U.y/.01/w)*abs(cos(s U.x*2e2/w)), S(abs(U.y)-.01*w) );\
               O *= .5+.5* smoothstep(0.,.1, abs(U.y+.05) ) ;    /* shadow */ \
               U.y += .3; 
   C(1.,)
   C(.8,)
   C(.6,)
   C(.3,.7+0.*)
   C(.2,.7+0.*)
   U.y -= 1.5;
   
   O += (1.-m) *.6* (1.-.4*length(U));                           // background
   
   if ( min( -U.y, abs(U.y+.6) ) < .15 )  P                      // pick above strings 1,3
}
renderpass.name: Image
